attacks.name: Darkness Howl
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) (excluding any Darkness Pokémon). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Power Claw
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Megaton Tail
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
